manifest.name: Filesystem
manifest.description: Let Claude access your filesystem to read and write files.
manifest.long_description:
This extension allows Claude to interact with your local filesystem, enabling it to read and write files directly. This can be useful for tasks such as file management, data processing, and automation of repetitive tasks. The extension provides a set of tools that can be used to navigate directories, read file contents, and write new files or modify existing ones.

Underneath the hood, it uses @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Edit the contents of a file

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List contents of a directory

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Display directory structure as a tree

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename a file

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Search for files by name or content

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Get information about a file

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: List directories that can be accessed

allowed_directories.title: Allowed Directories
allowed_directories.description: Select directories the filesystem server can access

manifest.name: Control your Mac
manifest.description: Execute AppleScript to automate tasks on macOS.
manifest.long_description: This tool allows you to execute AppleScript commands using `osascript`, enabling automation of tasks on macOS systems. Try asking Claude to do things on your Mac, like controlling applications or changing system settings.

tools.name: osascript
tools.description: Execute `osascript -e <script>`

manifest.name: context7
manifest.description: Up-to-date Code Docs For Any Prompt
manifest.long_description: Context7 MCP pulls up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples straight from the source — and places them directly into your prompt.

tools.name: Resolve Context7 Library ID
tools.description: Resolves a package/product name to a Context7-compatible library ID and returns a list of matching libraries.

tools.name: Get Library Docs
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library.

manifest.name: desktop-commander
manifest.description: Build, explore, and automate on your local machine with access to files and terminal.
manifest.long_description:
Combine local filesystem access with full terminal control to handle technical tasks through natural language. Desktop Commander empowers you to build, explore, and automate - from organizing repositories to creating complete applications:
* **Build from scratch** - Create features and applications with simple commands
* **Manage development environments** - Set up servers, configure systems, and handle processes
* **Manage context and documentation** - Keep track of project details and technical specifications
* **Explore existing codebases and projects** - Navigate and understand complex repositories

This extension bridges technical skill gaps by providing full command-line superpowers through an interface that understands your intent and handles complexity automatically.

tools.name: get_config
tools.description: Get the complete server configuration including blocked commands, allowed directories, file limits, telemetry settings, client info, and system information.

tools.name: set_config_value
tools.description: Set a specific configuration value by key. WARNING: Should be used in a separate chat from file operations to prevent security issues.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file from the file system or URL with optional offset and length parameters. Supports partial reading and handles images.

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously. Handles text files and renders images.

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write or append to file contents. Always write files in chunks of 25-30 lines maximum for best performance.

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists. Can create multiple nested directories in one operation.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: Get a detailed recursive listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Supports depth parameter (default: 2) for multi-level directory traversal.

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename files and directories between locations.

tools.name: start_search
tools.description: Start a streaming search for files by name or content within files. Returns results progressively with session ID.

tools.name: get_more_search_results
tools.description: Get more results from an active search with offset-based pagination.

tools.name: stop_search
tools.description: Stop an active search gracefully when you've found what you need.

tools.name: list_searches
tools.description: List all active searches with their status and runtime information.

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory including size, timestamps, permissions, and line counts.

tools.name: edit_block
tools.description: Apply surgical text replacements to files. Make small, focused edits with minimal context for precision.

tools.name: start_process
tools.description: Start a new terminal process with intelligent state detection. Primary tool for local file analysis (CSV, JSON, logs, etc.).

tools.name: read_process_output
tools.description: Read output from a running process with intelligent completion detection and REPL prompt recognition.

tools.name: interact_with_process
tools.description: Send input to a running process and automatically receive the response. Critical tool for all local file analysis.

tools.name: force_terminate
tools.description: Force terminate a running terminal session.

tools.name: list_sessions
tools.description: List all active terminal sessions with status information including blocked state and runtime.

tools.name: list_processes
tools.description: List all running processes with PID, command name, CPU usage, and memory usage.

tools.name: kill_process
tools.description: Terminate a running process by PID. Use with caution.

tools.name: get_usage_stats
tools.description: Get usage statistics for debugging and analysis including tool usage and performance metrics.

tools.name: get_recent_tool_calls
tools.description: Get recent tool call history with their arguments and outputs. Returns chronological list of tool calls made during this session for debugging, context recovery, and onboarding new chats.

tools.name: give_feedback_to_desktop_commander
tools.description: Open feedback form in browser to provide feedback about Desktop Commander.

tools.name: get_prompts
tools.description: Browse and retrieve curated Desktop Commander prompts for various tasks and workflows.

manifest.name: Notes
manifest.description: Read, write, and manage notes in Apple Notes
manifest.long_description:
This extension allows Claude to interact with your macOS Notes app, enabling creating, reading, updating, and listing notes.

It uses macOS automation features to interact with the Messages app and requires your explicit permission through macOS security prompts before accessing Messages or Contacts. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Apple Inc.

tools.name: list_notes
tools.description: List all notes from Apple Notes app

tools.name: get_note_content
tools.description: Get the content of a specific note by its name

tools.name: add_note
tools.description: Create a new note in Apple Notes

tools.name: update_note_content
tools.description: Update the content of an existing note

manifest.name: pdf-toolkit
manifest.display_name: PDF Tools - Analyze, Extract, Fill, Compare
manifest.description: Let Claude work with PDFs on your computer: read, analyze, fill forms, extract data
manifest.long_description:
Powerful PDF analysis toolkit for Claude Desktop.

**What Claude can do with your PDFs:**
• Analyze lengthy research papers and academic documents
• Extract data from technical documentation
• Compare multiple contract versions
• Fill out forms automatically
• Summarize complex reports

**Works with any PDF type:** Scientific papers, legal contracts, technical manuals, financial statements, invoices, and forms (W-9, 1099, I-9). Handles fillable forms, scanned documents, and encrypted PDFs.

**Key features:**
• Work with PDFs already on your computer without uploading
• Extract tables and structured data to CSV
• Bulk process hundreds of documents
• Handle password-protected files
• Save reusable profiles for common forms

**Perfect for:** Researchers analyzing literature, lawyers comparing contracts, engineers reviewing specifications, and businesses processing invoices. Claude excels at maintaining context across 300+ page documents.

tools.name: list_pdfs
tools.description: List all PDF files in a directory

tools.name: read_pdf_fields
tools.description: Read all form fields from a PDF file

tools.name: fill_pdf
tools.description: Fill a PDF form with provided data and save it

tools.name: bulk_fill_from_csv
tools.description: Fill multiple PDFs using data from a CSV file

tools.name: save_profile
tools.description: Save form data as a reusable profile

tools.name: load_profile
tools.description: Load a saved profile

tools.name: list_profiles
tools.description: List all saved profiles

tools.name: fill_with_profile
tools.description: Fill a PDF using a saved profile

tools.name: extract_to_csv
tools.description: Extract form data from filled PDFs to a CSV file

tools.name: validate_pdf
tools.description: Validate if all required fields in a PDF are filled

tools.name: read_pdf_content
tools.description: Read and analyze the full content of a PDF file - extract text, summarize, convert to other formats, or answer questions about the document

tools.name: get_pdf_resource_uri
tools.description: Get a resource URI for a PDF file that can be used with Claude's built-in PDF reading capabilities via the Resources API

prompts.name: research_paper_analysis
prompts.text: I'll analyze your research paper or academic document, focusing on ${arguments.focus_area}. I can extract key findings and methodology, identify research gaps, create chapter-by-chapter summaries, pull out all citations, and generate a literature review outline.

prompts.name: contract_comparison
prompts.text: I'll compare multiple contracts or legal documents, focusing on ${arguments.comparison_focus}. I'll highlight changed clauses, modified terms, added/removed sections, pricing differences, liability changes, and create a comparison summary.

prompts.name: financial_report_extraction
prompts.text: I'll extract and analyze data from your financial PDFs including all tables and key metrics. I'll convert the data to ${arguments.output_format} format for analysis, with specific page references for all extracted information.

prompts.name: document_qa_session
prompts.text: Let's discuss your PDF document. Starting with: ${arguments.initial_question}. I can find specific information, explain complex sections, cross-reference different parts, extract quotes with page numbers, and answer 'what if' scenarios.

prompts.name: bulk_invoice_processing
prompts.description: Process multiple invoices into structured data
prompts.text: I'll process all invoice PDFs in ${arguments.folder_path} and create a unified dataset in ${arguments.output_format} format. I'll extract vendor names, invoice numbers, dates, line items, totals, tax amounts, and payment terms.

prompts.name: technical_documentation_summary
prompts.text: I'll analyze your technical documentation and create ${arguments.summary_type}. I'll extract code examples, create reference guides, identify implementation steps, and summarize troubleshooting sections.

prompts.name: fill_w9_business
prompts.text: I'll help fill the W-9 for your business. I need: Business legal name, DBA/trade name (if different), business type (LLC/Corp/Partnership), tax classification, EIN, and business address. I'll properly check the correct tax classification boxes and ensure the form meets IRS requirements.

prompts.name: batch_invoices
prompts.text: I'll help you batch process invoices. Point me to the folder containing your invoice PDFs. I can: extract all amounts and dates, create a summary spreadsheet, identify missing information, calculate totals by vendor/date/category. What specific data do you need extracted?

prompts.name: rental_application
prompts.text: I'll help complete rental applications. Have ready: personal info, employment history (3 years), income verification, previous addresses (3 years), references, vehicle info, and emergency contact. I'll ensure all required fields are filled and flag any that need supporting documents.

prompts.name: extract_1099_data
prompts.text: I'll extract all data from your 1099 forms (1099-NEC, 1099-MISC, 1099-DIV, 1099-INT, etc.) and create a tax summary. I'll organize by payer, identify the type of income, sum totals by category, and format it for easy import into tax software.
